channel.title: Needbasiccommands
channel.description: lol,ijust need some basic commands. i havent been on this game for ages and i forgot them[br][size=1]Posted on: January 10, 2007, 04:21:38 PM[/size][hr]i really need to change my signature...lawscape hasnt been up for months =/

item.title: Needbasiccommands
item.dc:creator: @deidera deidera
item.description:
@deidera wrote:

Ok,first of all this is agaisnt the rules to ask.Don’t do it again.

2nd of all,go to the thread that is realeasing your source.In example: Phonecheck’s thread releasing phonescape-look at the features and commands etc there.

Read full topic

item.title: Needbasiccommands
item.dc:creator: @SFate SFate
item.description:
@SFate wrote:

Most likely look at the server you’re on. Find the advertisement thread in the proper forum, and on the first post there should be a list of working commands. If there are none, then post on their advertisement thread.

Read full topic

item.title: Needbasiccommands
item.dc:creator: @SFate SFate
item.description:
@SFate wrote:

You aren’t going to find “basic” commands here. Commands differ a lot from server to server. A couple common are:

::help
::tools
::mystats

Read full topic
